frontmatter.title: Food Wonderful Food
frontmatter.description: Before we look at whats good for us to eat I'd like to promote how wonderful food is. It should be celebrated and enjoyed. If you can - try to enjoy food around the table with family and friends, celebrate as often as you can! Give thanks before you eat, switch of the background noise and focus on your food; smell it and taste it and chew it well. These things are all so important to help your health and digestion.
